title: Easy Air Fryer Chicken Breast Recipe
description: This air fryer chicken breast is perfectly seasoned outside and air fried until golden, tender, and incredibly juicy inside for a quick and easy dinner.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Breast Easy Air Fryer Chicken Breast 4.9 (16) 16 Reviews 4 Photos This air fryer chicken breast is quick and simple to make and always comes out perfectly moist and juicy. This recipe is easy to scale up for more people. By Allrecipes Member Updated on January 16, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 4 4 4 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 20 mins Additional Time: 5 mins Total Time: 30 mins Servings: 1 Yield: 1 chicken breast Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 1 servings 1 (8 ounce) chicken breast 2 teaspoons olive oil 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat an air fryer to 360 degrees F (182 degrees C). Allrecipes / Qi Ai Brush both sides of chicken breast with olive oil; season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper on one side. Place chicken breast, seasoned-side down, into the air fryer basket and sprinkle the other side with garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Allrecipes / Qi Ai Cook in the preheated air fryer for 9 minutes. Flip chicken and continue cooking until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, about 9 more minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Allrecipes / Qi Ai Transfer chicken breast to a plate and loosely cover with aluminum foil. Let rest for 5 minutes before serving. Allrecipes / Qi Ai I Made It Print 49 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 456 Calories 17g Fat 1g Carbs 70g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 1 Calories 456 % Daily Value * Total Fat 17g 22% Saturated Fat 4g 18% Cholesterol 193mg 64% Sodium 168mg 7% Total Carbohydrate 1g 0% Dietary Fiber 0g 0% Total Sugars 0g Protein 70g 141% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 35mg 3% Iron 2mg 14% Potassium 590mg 13% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Air Fryer Chicken Breast 01 of 04 Photo by  Allrecipes / Qi Ai 02 of 04 Photo by  LovesCooking 01/13/2025 Great flavors Family favorite This recipe is awesome. It’s super easy to make and it turns out amazing each time. Very convenient for big parties as well. I recommend getting air chilled chicken without any retained water and the result is consistently delicious. 03 of 04 Photo by  Jennifer Cox 11/19/2024 Worth the effort Great flavors I used mesquite marinated checked breast 04 of 04 Photo by  Deb C 02/11/2022 This recipe is so quick and easy. I seasoned the chicken breast on both sides and then lightly pounded it so that it would be an even thickness which reduced the baking time by a couple of minutes. The chicken breast was delicious and moist. 1 You’ll Also Love Grilled Chicken with Rosemary and Bacon 354 Ratings BBQ Chicken Pouches 5 Ratings Honey Glazed Chicken 558 Ratings Instant Pot Salsa Chicken 192 Ratings Easy Butter Chicken 43 Ratings Basic Broiled Chicken Breasts 117 Ratings Crunchy French Onion Chicken 349 Ratings Easy Chicken Breast Wrapped in Bacon 32 Ratings Crumbed Chicken Tenderloins (Air Fried) 198 Ratings Kicky Stuffed Chicken 1 Rating Healthy Instant Pot® Chicken Breasts 2 Ratings Air Fryer Blackened Chicken Breasts 90 Ratings Air Fryer Popcorn-Crusted Popcorn Chicken Barbeque Bacon Chicken Bake 237 Ratings Juicy Slow Cooker Chicken Breast For Any Diet 41 Ratings Lemon Garlic Chicken Breasts 82 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
